config.name: Adjust Rune Droprate
config.description: Disable to not modify the droprate of runes.

config.name: Rune Droprate Multiplier
config.description: 1 = vanilla. 10 = Zod is about 10x as likely, more mid runes, fewer low runes. 100 = fairly even distribution, but more HRs than LRs/MRs.

config.name: Adjust Equipment Droprate
config.description: Disable to not modify the droprate of equipment.

config.name: Chance of Unique Item Dropping
config.description: Assuming the base item that dropped can be a unique item in this area level, this is the chance of it being a unique item. Vanilla value is 0.25%.

config.name: Chance of Set Item Dropping
config.description: Assuming the base item that dropped can be a set item in this area level, this is the chance of it being a set item. Vanilla value is 0.625%.

config.name: Chance of Rare Item Dropping
config.description: Assuming the base item that dropped can be a rare item, this is the chance of it being a rare item. Vanilla value is 1%.

config.name: Chance of Magic Item Dropping
config.description: Assuming the base item that dropped can be a magic item, this is the chance of it being a magic item. Vanilla value is 2.94%.

config.name: Chance of High Quality Item Dropping
config.description: Assuming the base item that dropped can be a high quality item, this is the chance of it being a high quality item. Vanilla value is 8.33%.

config.name: Disable Minimum Rarity
config.description: By default, unique, set and rare items have a minimum rarity that they cannot fall below despite magic find, etc... Turn this option on to disable this mechanic.

config.name: Disable Level Scaling
config.description: By default, items are more likely to be higher quality if dropped from a higher level monster. Turn this option on to disable this mechanic.
